page.title: 15Leisure
page.content: Young boys of about the age of ten have to make a lot of their own entertainment some of the time as there are no amenities. Most of them play football. If they want they can play with something else like their toys which might include fort and soldiers and farm toys. Many have BMX bicycles which they perform tricks on and going up on one wheel on the bike when the rider is still on it. Often fishing is a popular pastime. At nights they watch telly or play snooker. The girls when they were young climbed trees and made tree-huts out of wood. They played on their bikes and watched telly most of the time. At night they watched telly and played games.
